title: Relief of Maury Hernandez by the Department of Corrections
subject: subject index

abstracts.abstract:
Relief of Maury Hernandez by the Department of Corrections;  Providing for the relief of Maury Hernandez; providing an appropriation to compensate former Broward County Sheriff’s Deputy Maury Hernandez for injuries and damages sustained as a consequence of the Department of Corrections’ failures to enforce probation laws, regulations, and policies; providing legislative intent that certain liens be waived; providing a limitation on the payment of compensation and attorney fees, etc.
    
        CLAIM WITH APPROPRIATION:
        $5,000,000

actions.description: Referred to Special Master on Claim Bills; Judiciary; Appropriations Committee on Criminal and Civil Justice; Appropriations
